column4: i got a problem: i just created a live usb stick with 7.10 and now my ipw2200 isn't recognised by the system ... i can't even switch it on with the hardware button on my notebook (HP NX8220)
does it get listed when you run 'lspci'?
no it doesnt get listed there
then it's a hardware issue, or it may be turned off in the BIOS. The easiest way to turn it on may be to reboot and hit the WLAN button before the kernel boots.
